value:
$WmMPID_愛の祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Valentine21,Face|The Day of Devotion is a wonderful
festival, but wearing this outfit is a
little embarrassing.$k$pI think I'll try to stay out of sight.
I don't want to distract from the
festivities, after all...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Valentine21,Face|Oh, Alfonse! Are you trying to hide?
Come, now... Come join your family.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Valentine21,Face|Urg, Mother! I just want to observe
everyone enjoying the festival from
over here.$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Valentine21,Face|And what a waste that would be!
Especially considering who all from
our family will be in attendance. $k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Valentine21,Face|What? Wait. You mean...Father is—$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Valentine21,Face|Surprised? It's only natural for a king
to participate in the festivals of his
country, is it not?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Valentine21,Face|...Yes. I suppose that is true.$k$pIt's just that I don't recall us visiting
a festival like this before, so it's not
something I'm used to...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭グスタフ,ch00_13_Gustaf_M_Valentine21,Face|...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヘンリエッテ,ch00_14_Henriette_F_Valentine21,Face|I hope you two won't be quite this
awkward all festival... Let's try to
enjoy our time together! Shall we?$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Valentine21,Face|Yes, right!$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_比翼リーヴ,ch00_17_Lif_MF_Pair,Face|With the festival as a distraction,
there are none to match us here.$k$p$nMPID_スラシル味方|Let us proceed as we will...$k$p$WmMPID_愛の祭ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Valentine21,Face|Are...these two...$k$p
